message:
Ingame Headshot and Sniper will be updated be safe in Singapore server. 
Other server have some blacklist issues so test in small account first. 


Update Features: 

Ingame Headshot v1 , v2 , v3 And Headshot 2.0 Load 
Sniper Scope , Sniper Fast Switch ( High , Medi , Low ) 
Added new aim position ( Cheat ) 
in experimental option. As you can see these features are risky and have ban chances. Only use
them in small accounts for rank push.

Please check client notice for more info.
